ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] Installing problems osx matlab
ygData.msgSnippet: The build process writes a script setup.m and then invokes Matlab to process it. Check to see that setup.m is being created in directory Cantera/matlab.  If

The build process writes a script "setup.m" and then invokes Matlab  
to process it. Check to see that setup.m is being created in  
directory Cantera/matlab.  If it is, you can try first going into  
Matlab and then running it.


On Apr 20, 2007, at 9:04 AM, agentesilvia wrote:

> Hi everybody,
> my name is Valerio and 'm a PhD student in Aerospace Engineering at  
> Naples University
> (Italy) I'm trying to install cantera on a G5 mac running osx  
> 10.4.9 and Matlab R2006b but
> in the Matlab part of the process (the one of my particular  
> interest) I'm receiving the
> following error (at matlab prompt):
>
> cd Cantera/matlab; make
> /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/Current/bin/python  
> setup_matlab.py /
> Applications/Cantera/bin /Users/apple/Desktop/cantera-1.7.0/build/ 
> lib/powerpc-apple-
> darwin8.9.0 clib '-luser -loneD -lzeroD -ltransport -lcantera - 
> lcvode  -lctmath -ltpx -
> lctf2c -lconverters  -lSystem'
> (/usr/local/bin/matlab -nojvm -nosplash -r setup)
> Warning: Unable to open display , MATLAB is starting without a  
> display.
>   You will not be able to display graphics on the screen.
>
